Primera División de Fútbol Profesional A: In the 1st place, team C.D. FAS played 18 matches, won 10, drew 6, and lost 2. They scored 27 goals, conceded 13, with a goal difference of +14, accumulating a total of 36 points.
In the 2nd place, team C.D. Águila played 18 matches, won 9, drew 4, and lost 5. They scored 38 goals, conceded 26, with a goal difference of +12, accumulating a total of 31 points.
In the 4th place, San Salvador F.C. played 18 matches, won 8, drew 4, and lost 6. They scored 31 goals, conceded 27, with a goal difference of +4, accumulating a total of 28 points.
In the 6th place, A.D. Isidro Metapán played 18 matches, won 4, drew 9, and lost 5. They scored 20 goals, conceded 23, with a goal difference of -3, accumulating a total of 21 points.
In the 8th place, C.D. Arcense played 18 matches, won 2, drew 11, and lost 5. They scored 23 goals, conceded 32, with a goal difference of -11, accumulating a total of 17 points.
In the 9th place, Chalatenango played 18 matches, won 4, drew 5, and lost 9. They scored 13 goals, conceded 22, with a goal difference of -9, accumulating a total of 17 points.
